A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved the movie. Loved the political echos from our current dystopia. Loved Carrie Fischer's performance. Enjoyed the other main characters' performances\, especially the cute little penguin-chicken things. Loved the diverse cast with their good acting and good humor. It was a family-friendly flick. More back story might have been helpful\, but not really necessary. I mean - with impossible things happening all the time\, it really didn't matter that the story wasn't 100% logical.
